abilities.name: Gomu Gomu no Kane
abilities.description: A powerful headbutt technique where Luffy uses his rubber body to restrain his opponent before delivering a devastating headbutt. Used to defeat Captain Kuro.

keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts the Gomu Gomu no Kane technique, using it to defeat Captain Kuro by restraining him with his rubber body and delivering a powerful headbutt that shatters Kuro's glasses.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's continued creativity in developing new applications of his rubber powers, expanding beyond basic punching and kicking techniques.
